attributes.action: Return unlimited sugar drink refills in restaurants opposing recent restrictions
attributes.additional_details: The sugar tax already inflates prices and unfairly punishes consumers and small businesses, despite many switching to artificial sweeteners — which come with their own health concerns. Sugar in moderation is not the enemy. Education, not control, is the real solution.
attributes.background: The restrictions on sugary drink refills are an overreach that removes personal freedom and limits choice. People — not politicians — should decide what they consume. For example, diabetics experiencing hypoglycemia may urgently need access to sugary drinks, and blanket bans make that harder.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign the following petition, which calls for similar action:

Revoke regulations that restrict promotion of high sugar/fat food and drink
